title: Restaurant Paisatges
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Japanese, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a weekly changing menu. Some vegan choices are tebia salad vegetables, arros comprehensive basmatico with ratatouille, pancake pepper and eggplant baked with quinoa and pumpkin, vegetable stew, doriyaki with chocolate and praline avellanes and mini Irish coffee. Quiet atmosphere for families.
